item.title: GoF Builder Pattern
item.author: Nghia
item.description: Builder Pattern and Factory Pattern are pretty similar in a way: both of them encapsulate the details of object-creation processes. However, in cases there are many complicated processes to create various representations of objects, and those processes share a common trait, Builder Pattern is the better choice. Let’s say we have two processes to build a house: Asian process and European one. We will start with Factory Pattern and gradually adapt it to Builder Pattern.
